item.title: Content Creators - Moms with Kids Aged 3-5 - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for talented content creators who are moms with kids between the ages of 3-7 to join our team. Our ideal candidates are experienced in content creation and understand the importance of good lighting. They should be able to follow our scripts and guidelines precisely to produce high-quality content. In this role you will not need to worry about editing at all, your job will be to product high-quality engaging clips.

Responsibilities:
- Create engaging and high-quality content as per the provided scripts and guidelines.
- Ensure good lighting and sound quality in all video content.
- Collaborate with our team to ensure the content meets our standards and objectives.

Requirements:
- Must be a mom with a child/children aged 3-7.
- Proven experience in content creation (please provide examples of your work).
- Knowledge of good lighting techniques.
- Ability to follow detailed scripts and guidelines.
- Good communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively.
- Have necessary equipment for content creation (camera, tripod, lighting, etc.)

UGC Brief: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1zLNmCdLXNCPZREs8DoK_5pU_QGJw7LUBKAvawZ6cqjA/edit?usp=sharing
